channel.title: Hello, I'm Matthew, attorney with web development aspirations
channel.description: Like it says on the label, I'm a licensed attorney in Michigan, currently working with Ruby on Rails to create useful tools for legal practitioners and others.

item.title: Hello, I'm Matthew, attorney with web development aspirations
item.dc:creator: jasonswett
item.description:
Matthew is an IRL friend of mine and I’m trying to help him develop a business idea and eventually a business.

Matthew, why don’t you tell them about your idea(s)?

Read full topic
item.source: Hello, I'm Matthew, attorney with web development aspirations

item.title: Hello, I'm Matthew, attorney with web development aspirations
